snippet: An interview with defender Oguchi Onyewu, who talks about playing for his country and for Sporting Lisbon, his motivation to appear in a third World Cup in 2014 and why his family likes to joke about his soccer career.
abstract: An interview with defender Oguchi Onyewu, who talks about playing for his country and for Sporting Lisbon, his motivation to appear in a third World Cup in 2014 and why his family likes to joke about his soccer career.

headline.main: Q. and A. with U.S. National Team Defender Oguchi Onyewu
